en: O praise Jehovah, all ye nations; Laud him, all ye peoples.
hmr: Aw hnam tinrênghai, LALPA chu inpâk unla, Mi tinrênghai, ama chu inpâk ro.

en: For his lovingkindness is great toward us; And the truth of Jehovah endureth for ever. Praise ye Jehovah.
hmr: A ngilneina chu ei chungah a nasain, LALPA thutak chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
